direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods set flags that request changes in the server's response, affecting IP and port respectively.
The getter method can be used to verify the effect of the setter method in test cases.
Both methods handle flag settings based on binary data, with similar control flows and exception handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the ChangeRequestAttribute is required before setting flags.
Setting the change IP flag may influence the context in which the change port flag is set.
The encode method can be used to verify the binary representation after setting the change port flag.
